TEXT.TITLE: ELECTROLYTIC REFINING LOWERS COPPER PRICE
TEXT.BODY: The Electrolytic Refining and Smelting Co of Australia Pty Ltd said it lowered its ex-works Port Kembla Refinery Copper Price by 20 dlrs to 2,160 dlrs a tonne, effective today. REUTER
